text: University Institute of Technology, The University of Burdwan (abbr. UITBU) is a "NAAC A accredited" Tier-II (under TEQIP) University represents the Faculty of Engineering & Technology(FET), constituent to The University of Burdwan, located in Burdwan, West Bengal. It is the only Government Engineering Public University located in Purba Bardhaman district. ==References== Category:Education in India Category:West Bengal Category:1999 establishments in India
title: University Institute of Technology, The University of Burdwan
